import React from 'react' import { Formik, Form, Field, ErrorMessage } from 'formik' import * as yup from 'yup' function InputEntry() { const initialValues = { name: "", gstin: "", contact: "", email: "", address: "", city: "", state: "", country: "", pincode: "" } const submit = (values, submitProps) => { console.log("form values", values) submitProps.resetForm() } const validationSchema = yup.object({ name: yup.string().required("Please Enter Name") }) return (
) } export default InputEntry
